pullrequest.title: Add installation guide for OSX from source

content.raw: I think it would be nice to get it out with the release, just so users can have some sort of guide. It definitely needs more improvement from here. I don’t know how much time/work is needed to make it look better, but if it’s gonna take longer than a week, then we can probably merge this one first then work from there. @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} What do you think?
content.html: I think it would be nice to get it out with the release, just so users can have some sort of guide. It definitely needs more improvement from here. I don’t know how much time/work is needed to make it look better, but if it’s gonna take longer than a week, then we can probably merge this one first then work from there. @Louise Poubel What do you think?
